item.title: 野村股价自 2016 年以来首次升至关键指标之上
item.description: 野村控股公司的市净率自 2016 年底以来首次达到 1 的门槛，达到了东京证券交易所为提高股东价值而设定的重要基准。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc.’s price-to-book ratio hit the threshold of 1 for the first time since late 2016, meeting an important benchmark set by the Tokyo Stock Exchange in its drive to improve shareholder value.】

item.title: 中国为提高出生率对避孕套加税
item.description: 中国将在三十年来首次对包括避孕套在内的避孕药品和器具征收增值税，这是中国扭转出生率骤降局面的最新举措。【原文：China will impose a value-added tax on contraceptive drugs and devices — including condoms — for the first time in three decades, its latest bid to reverse plunging birth rates that threaten to further slow its economy.】

item.title: 人工智能初创企业 Upstage 聘请 KB Securities 和未来证券参与韩国 IPO
item.description: 据知情人士透露，韩国人工智能初创公司Upstage已聘请KB证券公司和未来资产证券公司协助其最早于2026年下半年进行首次公开募股。【原文：South Korean AI startup Upstage has hired KB Securities Co. and Mirae Asset Securities Co. to assist with an initial public offering as early as the second half of 2026, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 报道称日本议员在争吵中会见中国特使
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，一个由日本议员组成的促进对华友好联盟在东京会见了中国驻日本大使吴江浩，这标志着两国努力缓和紧张局势，同时两国也在有争议的岛屿问题上发生了争执。【原文：A coalition of Japanese lawmakers promoting friendship with China met with Chinese Ambassador to Japan Wu Jianghao in Tokyo according to local media, signaling efforts to ease tensions while the two nations also sparred over disputed islands.】

item.title: 受节日需求和天气风险影响，棕榈油恢复上涨
item.description: 棕榈油在需求上升的前景下恢复上涨，而交易商则在关注世界主要种植国洪灾的影响。【原文：Palm oil resumed gains on the outlook for rising demand, while traders monitored the impact of flooding in the world’s top growers.】

item.title: 新加坡华侨银行财富业务大放异彩，股价再创新高
item.description: 据分析师称，由于财富管理业务表现出色，华侨银行股价创下新纪录。【原文：Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp. shares hit a fresh record as the wealth-management business outperforms, according to analysts.】

item.title: 印度 Torrent Gas 公司聘请花旗等两家公司进行 4.5 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度 Torrent Gas 有限公司已为其计划中的首次公开募股聘请了三家银行，募集资金可能高达 4.5 亿美元。【原文：India’s Torrent Gas Ltd. has hired three banks for its planned initial public offering that may raise as much as $450 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 硬碰硬的同情打压债券市场
item.description:
日本和美联储的一记重拳使收益率上扬。【原文：

A one-two slap from Japan and the Fed sends yields upward.

】

item.title: 史蒂夫-科恩出任赌场老板是对冲基金大亨的最新转机
item.description: 对冲基金巨头。电影人物艺术品收藏家运动队老板。可能很快还会成为赌场老板。【原文：Hedge fund titan. Movie character. Art collector. Sports team owner. And possibly soon, casino boss.】

item.title: 美国公司正在抢购欧洲需要重新崛起的稀土
item.description: 随着欧洲开始进行历史性的重新武装，其国防公司正在争夺高科技武器中的一个重要组成部分：稀土矿，而更灵活的美国竞争对手正在抢夺稀土矿。【原文：As Europe embarks on a historic rearming effort, its defense companies are scrambling for a vital component in high-tech weapons: rare earth minerals, which more nimble US rivals are scooping up.】

item.title: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔预计债务压力将从 2028 年底开始缓解
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，在政府努力削减财政赤字的推动下，他预计该国的债务压力将从2028年底开始缓解。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said he expects the country’s debt pressures to ease beginning end-2028, driven by the government’s efforts to reduce its fiscal deficit.】

item.title: 贸易僵局加剧，印度卢比逼近每美元 90 美元的关键关口
item.description: 印度卢比今年已经测试了一系列历史新低，一些分析师警告说，如果与美国的重要贸易协议不能很快达成，印度卢比可能会跌至每美元 90 美元的心理关口。【原文：The Indian rupee has tested a series of record lows this year, and some analysts warn it could slip to the psychologically key 90-per-dollar level if a crucial trade deal with the US doesn’t materialize soon.】

item.title: 据称凯雷有意入股印度住房金融公司
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. is in talks to buy a majority stake in an Indian home mortgage firm as it seeks to step up investments in the local financial services sector, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 财富》称 Burry 因估值和马斯克薪酬计划看空特斯拉
item.description: 迈克尔-伯里（Michael Burry）对特斯拉公司的股票下了赌注，称其 "估值高得离谱"，并警告说创始人埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）提出的 1 万亿美元薪酬方案将加剧股东稀释。【原文：Michael Burry has bet against the shares of Tesla Inc., saying they are “ridiculously overvalued” and warning that founder Elon Musk’s proposed $1 trillion pay package would worsen shareholder dilution.】

item.title: 印尼向金砖国家牵头的新开发银行拨款 10 亿美元
item.description: 印尼将向金砖国家领导的新开发银行拨款 10 亿美元，进一步加强与该发展中国家集团的联系。【原文：Indonesia will assign $1 billion to the BRICS-led New Development Bank, further boosting ties with the group of developing nations.】

item.title: 10 年期债券拍卖需求缓解，日本债券上涨
item.description: 日本政府债券在周二的 10 年期债券拍卖中吸引了强劲的需求，收益率上升吸引了买家，有助于抵消对近期加息的日益增长的预期。【原文：Japanese government bonds rose after Tuesday’s 10-year auction drew solid demand, with elevated yields luring buyers and helping offset growing expectations for a near-term rate hike.】

item.title: 韩国领导人敦促迅速调查该国最大数据泄露事件
item.description: 韩国总统李在明敦促尽快调查韩国有史以来最大的数据泄露事件，在该事件中，在线零售商 Coupang Inc.【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung urged a speedy investigation into the country’s largest ever data breach in which more than 30 million customer accounts at online retailer Coupang Inc. were compromised.】

item.title: 中国敦促国内生产商加快铁矿石项目建设
item.description: 中国钢铁工业协会敦促当地矿石生产商加快关键项目的建设，因为全球最大的矿石消费国正在努力解决依赖必和必拓集团等顶级矿商进口矿石供应的问题。【原文：The China Iron and Steel Association urged local ore producers to speed up key projects, as the world’s biggest consumer grapples with its dependence on imported supplies from top miners such as BHP Group.】

item.title: 中国需求受寒冬影响，铜价从历史高位回落
item.description: 铜从历史高位回落，原因是有迹象表明，进入冬季后中国需求疲软可能有助于缓解迫在眉睫的全球供应紧张。【原文：Copper retreated from a record high, on signs that softer Chinese demand heading into winter might help to ease a looming global supply crunch.】

item.title: 中央电视台称 12 月近一半中国赴日航班停飞
item.description: 据中国国家媒体报道，随着亚洲最大的两个经济体之间日益加深的争端对航空旅行和旅游业造成的影响不断扩大，12 月份从中国飞往日本的定期航班约有 40% 被取消。【原文：Some 40% of scheduled flights from China to Japan in December have been scrapped, according to Chinese state media, as the fallout for air travel and tourism from a deepening dispute between two of Asia’s largest economies grows.】

item.title: 印度卢比创下新低将影响股市情绪
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 安瓦尔称英特尔承诺向马来西亚芯片投资 2.08 亿美元
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，英特尔公司将追加投资 8.6 亿林吉特（约合 2.08 亿美元），使马来西亚成为其组装和测试运营中心，从而推动这个东南亚国家在全球半导体供应链中发挥关键作用。【原文：Intel Corp. will invest an additional 860 million ringgit ($208 million) to make Malaysia its assembly and testing operations center, according to Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim, giving a boost to the Southeast Asian nation’s critical role in the global semiconductor supply chain.】

item.title: 据说 KKR 支持的 Musinsa 将选择花旗和摩根大通参与上市工作
item.description: KKR & Co.支持的韩国时装零售商Musinsa Co.已选定花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）和摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）负责明年可能进行的首次公开募股。【原文：KKR & Co.-backed South Korean fashion retailer Musinsa Co. has picked Citigroup Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co. to work on an initial public offering that may take place next year.】

item.title: General Atlantic 获得私人贷款资助连锁炸鸡店交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，General Atlantic Service Company LP 已从 Ares Management Corp. 和野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：General Atlantic Service Company LP has secured a private credit loan from Ares Management Corp. and Nomura Holdings Inc. to finance its acquisition of a stake in Australian chicken chain El Jannah, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 与英伟达达成协议整合人工智能 Fanuc 股价大涨
item.description: Fanuc 公司表示将与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）在现实世界的工厂生产线和生产模拟中开展合作，随后该公司股价上涨了 9.4%，达到 2021 年 7 月以来的最高点。【原文：Fanuc Corp. shares rose as much as 9.4% to the highest since July 2021 after the company said it’s partnering with Nvidia Corp. in real-world factory lines as well as in production simulations.】

item.title: 日本央行发出加息信号后，日本大臣们避免反击
item.description: 在日本央行行长上田一夫发出本月可能加息的最明确暗示一天后，日本的财政部长和经济部长们没有表示任何反对意见。【原文：Japan’s finance and economic ministers didn’t indicate any objections a day after Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda delivered the clearest hint yet pointing to the possibility of an interest rate increase this month.】

item.title: 片山说：日本国家专家组对保持市场信任 "至关重要
item.description: 日本启动了自己的 "政府效率部"，并在成立大会上制定了计划，以确定和剔除无效的税收措施和补贴。【原文：Japan launched its own version of the Department of Government Efficiency with an inaugural meeting setting out plans to identify and weed out ineffective tax measures and subsidies.】

item.title: 贸易商称中国仍可兑现美国大豆承诺
item.description: 据多家贸易商称，中国预计将加大对美国大豆的采购力度，以兑现在年底前至少购买 1200 万吨大豆的承诺，这凸显了更广泛的市场希望，即至少在农业领域，脆弱的贸易休战能够维持下去。【原文：China is expected to step up US soybean purchases to meet a pledge to buy at least 12 million tons by the end of the year, according to multiple traders, underscoring a wider market hope that — at least in agriculture — a fragile trade truce can hold.】

item.title: 澳大利亚可通过 "温和密度 "计划应对住房危机
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，澳大利亚可以通过 "温和密度 "战略增加近100万套住房的供应量，这种在新西兰成功应用的模式将有助于解决住房危机。【原文：Australia could bolster housing supply by almost 1 million homes through a “gentle density” strategy, a model successfully applied in New Zealand that would help address an accommodation crisis, a new report showed.】

item.title: 三星在折叠式 iPhone 上市前数月首次推出三折手机
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co. Ltd.）发布了其首款所谓的三折智能手机，炫耀其在可折叠设备方面的工程实力，尽管这一更广泛的类别尚未受到主流消费者的青睐。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. unveiled its first so-called trifold smartphone, flaunting its engineering prowess in foldable devices even as the broader category has yet to catch on with mainstream consumers.】
